name: Subacute Hypersensitivity Pneumonitis
chief_complaint: I've had this nagging cough and shortness of breath for weeks, and it's getting worse.
prognosis: Good with early intervention and antigen avoidance, but may progress to fibrosis if untreated
description: An immune-mediated inflammatory lung disease caused by repeated inhalation of organic antigens (commonly bird proteins or mold). Presents subacutely with progressive respiratory symptoms over weeks to months. Characterized by lymphocytic infiltration and granuloma formation on histology.
